com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology

Interface IDistributedApplicationRegistry

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IPhysicalTopology, IPhysicalTopologyMonitor, ITopologyMonitor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractApplicationRegistry, AbstractPhysicalTopologyMonitor, AbstractStarTopologyMonitor, BcastTopologyMonitor, CentralizedTopologyMonitor, DistributedApplicationRegistryProxy, FixedRegistry, GaianNeighborOnlyTopologyMonitor, InternalPhysicalTopoMonitor, InternalRegistry, McastTopologyMonitor, PhysicalTopologyMonitorProxy, StarTopology, StarTopologyMonitor, TopologyMonitor, WPMLRepAppRegistry

    public interface IDistributedApplicationRegistry
    Provides a global registry which mapping application name and key to a URI that can be used to send tuples to the registered application. In general, the registry should be visibile from multiple JVMs, possible across multiple hosts. The registry needs to be started using start() before applications can be registered or identified via lookups.
    Author:
    dawood

    • Method Detail

      • register

        java.lang.Object register(IApplicationDescriptor app,
                        java.net.URI recvr)
                          throws DSMException
        Register this URI with the given app. The combination of app name space and instance id should be unique within the registry.
        Parameters:
        app - app descriptor includes name space and instance id.
        recvr - URI that can be used to send tuples.
        Returns:
        a unique cookie for this registration or null if could not be stored.
        Throws:
        DSMException

      • getRegistrations

        java.util.Collection<IApplicationRegistration> getRegistrations(java.lang.String appNamespace)
        Get all keys registered for a given application name space.
        Parameters:
        appNamespace -
        Returns:
        never null

      • deregister

        boolean deregister(java.lang.Object cookie)
                   throws DSMException
        Remove the entry associated with the cookie returned by a call to #register(String, String, URI).
        Parameters:
        cookie -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        DSMException

      • clear

        void clear()
           throws DSMException
        Remove all entries from the registry. Not sure if this is need for anything but testing.
        Throws:
        DSMException

      • lookup

        IApplicationRegistration lookup(IApplicationDescriptor app)
        Find the registration for the given application descriptor.
        Parameters:
        app -
        Returns:
        null if not found.

      • start

        void start()
           throws DSMException
        Begin any threads or otherwise that need starting before the other operations can be performed. This should also effectively reset the state of the registry.
        Throws:
        DSMException

      • stop

        void stop()
          throws DSMException
        Stop the registry. Any dynamic registrations that happen betweeen start() and stop() should be cleared from the registry so that the registry is effectively in its initialized stated.
        Throws:
        DSMException

      • isStarted

        boolean isStarted()
